ai-patthana16.52:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.52:0.3_0: Transmigration for one who is attached to the beginning,
ai-patthana16.52:1.1_0: It is the condition for the unproclaimed, for the sake of non-existence, and for the sake of non-disappearance condition.
ai-patthana16.52:2.1_0: The three supports the objects, three it is in brief.
